amendment.description: To modify the provision relating to economic adjustment assistance for upland cotton users, to provide payments for losses relating to peach and blueberry crops, and to strike the provision relating to the use of the Commodity Credit Corporation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3348 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3348 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4714; text: CR S4714) To modify the provision relating to economic adjustment assistance for upland cotton users, to provide payments for losses relating to peach and blueberry crops, and to strike the provision relating to the use of the Commodity Credit Corporation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3348 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3348 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 3224.
